title: Ticket #1451: The collector should advertise itself immediately
description: The collector doesn't advertise itself until it has been running for COLLECTOR_UPDATE_INTERVAL seconds. This is contrary to other daemons, who advertise themselves to the collector as soon as they start. The Collector should advertise itself immediately on startup, then ever COLLECTOR_UPDATE_INTERVAL.
